properties.name: com.papaio.anonchat.user-prefix
properties.description: Defines prefix for specified-user messages channel.

properties.name: com.papaio.anonchat.system-name
properties.description: Name of system that will be displayed in server messages, notifications, warnings and etc.

properties.description: Defines prefix for messages sent from user.
